Name: Anyday
rawData: Anyday is a rock band from Springdale, Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada. The band's music falls into the pop rock music genre. The three members of the band are Glenn Thomas, Devin Robinson, and Clint Curtis. The band formed in 2009. On November 14, 2009, Anyday performed alongside Kellie Loder at a benefit concert at Springdale's Indian River High School. The band signed with Nashville, Tennessee, United States-based Contemporary Christian record label Broken Records in 2010.
